name: atasm-altirra-bridge
description: Build and debug your 6502 assembler projects with Atasm/Mads and Altirra
author: Peter Hinz

enumDescriptions: ATasm is shipped with this extension
Mads, you must setup a path to it

atasm-altirra-bridge.assembler.atasmPath.description: Don't wish to use the included version of atasm? Specify the full path (including filename) of your atasm installation:

atasm-altirra-bridge.assembler.madsPath.description: Don't wish to use atasm? Specify the full path (including filename) of mads:

atasm-altirra-bridge.assembler.atasm.out.description:
Whether to tell ATasm to export symbols (equates, labels, macros) for the `Symbols Explorer`.
Sets the -hvclm flag and generates the `asm-symbols.json` file.

Tell ATasm NOT to export equates (abc = 123) for the `Symbols Explorer`.
Clears 'c' from the -hvclm flag.

Tell ATasm NOT to export labels (ABC jmp ABC) for the `Symbols Explorer`.
Clears 'l' from the -hvclm flag.

Tell ATasm NOT to export macro definitions (.macro NAME) for the `Symbols Explorer`.
Clears 'm' from the -hvclm flag.

atasm-altirra-bridge.editor.clearPreviou.description: Whether to clear the previous output window before the assembler is triggered.

atasm-altirra-bridge.editor.saveAllFiles.description: Whether to save all files before build is triggered.

atasm-altirra-bridge.editor.saveFileBefo.description: Whether to save the active file before build is triggered.

atasm-altirra-bridge.editor.showAssemble.description: Whether to show the assembler messages in the output window.

atasm-altirra-bridge.editor.statusBarCom.description: Show information and feature short-cuts on the Status Bar (requires restart).

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.ownEmulato.description: Supply your own emulator path and command line settings (Ignore all Altirra settings)

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.own.args.description: Specify all command line arguments for your own emulator i.e. --v /run -debug

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.own.path.markdownDescription: Specify the full path to the emulator

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.altirra.au.description: Automatically close any existing Altirra instances before opening a new one

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.altirra.si.description: Only run a single instance of the Altirra emulator

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.altirra.pa.markdownDescription: Specify the full path (including filename) of your [Altirra Installation](http://www.virtualdub.org/altirra.html)

atasm-altirra-bridge.emulator.altirra.re.description: Specify the region (NTSC or PAL) that the emulator will run in.

atasm-altirra-bridge.application.configu.description: Show welcome message after installing a new release of Atasm Altirra Bridge.

atasm-altirra-bridge.viewer.memory.size.description: Segment Size for the Memory Viewer.

atasm-altirra-bridge.viewer.memory.roms.markdownDescription: Show Rom Segments Next To Program Segments
